name: Mue Tab
description: Mue Tab is a customizable new tab extension that transforms your browsing experience. Enjoy stunning backgrounds, motivational quotes, and useful widgets like to-do lists and weather updates. Personalize your tab with themes and productivity tools to make every new tab inspiring and efficient.
detailed_description: Mue Tab started as a simple idea: make every new tab page beautiful and functional. What began as a personal project has grown into a popular browser extension with thousands of users worldwide. The extension offers a completely customizable experience with stunning photography, useful widgets, and productivity features.
key_features: Quick links for frequently visited sites
Time and date display with timezone support
technical_highlights: Modular widget architecture allowing easy feature additions
Efficient image preloading and caching system
Responsive design that works across all screen sizes
Privacy-focused design with local data storage
Extensive customization options with live preview

name: Kaiso IP
description: A reliable, modern take on the IP locator tool.
detailed_description: Kaiso IP is a clean, modern IP lookup tool that provides detailed information about any IP address. Built with performance and user experience in mind, it offers instant results with a beautiful, intuitive interface. The tool provides comprehensive geolocation data, ISP information, and security insights.
technical_highlights: Built with TypeScript for type safety
Error boundaries for graceful failure handling

name: Scroll
description: Scroll reinvents Wikipedia discovery with an endless, TikTok-inspired feed. Swipe to uncover the world's knowledge, one scroll at a time.
detailed_description: Scroll transforms how people discover Wikipedia content by presenting articles in an endless, swipeable feed similar to TikTok. This innovative approach makes learning addictive and fun, encouraging users to explore topics they might never have searched for. The app curates interesting articles and presents them in bite-sized, engaging formats.
technical_highlights: Custom Wikipedia API wrapper for better data handling
Virtualized scrolling for performance with large lists
Progressive Web App with offline capabilities
Swipe gesture recognition with touch events
Responsive design optimized for mobile consumption
